header.rec_loc: Campervan journey from Tarnow to Białka Tatrzańska, Poland – part 1.
header.topics: Party, buying/building/renting a home, racism, relationships, not drinking, the stay in Białka Tatrzańska, sleep patterns, friendship issues, health.
header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) while driving in a campervan from Tarnow to Białka Tatrzańska, Poland – part 1.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language

but there was a gap where I finished work at three in the afternoon and started again seven in the evening so I had to drive home which was about half an hour and then I'd have something to eat and then I would nap and then I'd get up and wash and then go to work in the evening till eleven or midnight or whatever and that nap between jobs was just so important

it really was crucial to not killing myself driving and getting enough with hindsight I suppose I look back and I think what a nut job working so bloody hard why did I do that? that was just crazy but hey you know done is done and that's the person I was back then so
